channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-41810|2024-09-16T17:18:03.386Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Admin tool allows storing configuration data with script which may then get run by another vault administrator. Requires vault admin level authentication and is not remotely exploitable

item.title: CVE-2024-6789|2024-09-16T06:19:05.367Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: A path traversal issue in API endpoint in M-Files Server before version 24.8.13981.0 and LTS 24.2.13421.15 SR2 and LTS 23.8.12892.0 SR6 allows authenticated user to read files

item.title: CVE-2024-6789|2024-08-27T13:13:43.057Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: A path traversal issue in API endpoint in M-Files Server before version 24.8.13981.0 allows authenticated user to read files

item.title: CVE-2024-6789|2024-08-27T09:57:00.441Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: A path traversal issue in API endpoint in M-Files Server before version 24.8.13981.0 allows authenticated user to read files

item.title: CVE-2024-5142|2024-08-19T13:57:23.035Z -- m-files%20corporation -- hubshare
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Social Module in M-Files Hubshare before version 5.0.3.8 allows authenticated attacker to run scripts in other users browser

item.title: CVE-2024-4056|2024-08-01T20:26:57.309Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Denial of service condition in M-Files Server in versions before 24.4.13592.4 and after 23.11 (excluding 24.2 LTS) allows unauthenticated user to consume computing resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-6881|2024-07-30T16:15:25.169Z -- m-files%20corporation -- hubshare
item.description: Stored XSS in M-Files Hubshare versions before 5.0.6.0 allows an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript in user's browser session

item.title: CVE-2024-6881|2024-07-29T12:56:51.695Z -- m-files%20corporation -- hubshare
item.description: Stored XSS in M-Files Hubshare versions before 5.0.6.0 allows an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript in user's browser session

item.description: Denial of service condition in M-Files Server in versions before 24.4.13592.4 and after 23.11 (excluding 24.2 LTS) allows unauthenticated user to consume computing resources.

item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in Social Module in M-Files Hubshare before version 5.0.3.8 allows authenticated attacker to run scripts in other users browser

item.description: Reflected XSS in M-Files Hubshare before version 5.0.6.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the context of the victim's browser session
